interpolation.name: interpolation
interpolation.description: embed expressions into marked up text.

{
   "prefix": {
      "label": "prefix",
      "value": "",
      "multiline": false,
      "prefix": "",
      "suffix": "",
      "options": null
   },

      "suffix": "?.",
      "options": null
   },

      "options": null
   },
   "suffix": {
      "label": "suffix",
      "value": "",
      "multiline": false,
      "prefix": "",
      "suffix": "",
      "options": null
   }
}

modal.name: modal
modal.paramInfo:

html5.name: html5
html5.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    [#]favicon[/#]
    [#]title[/#]
    [#]base-url[/#]
    [#]bootstrap-jquery[/#]
    [#]my-js[/#]
</head>
<body>
[#]doc-ready[/#]
</body>
</html>
